creator: mike.hovis@sailpoint.com
text:
When an application built with Java 6 Update 45 and version 1.2.16 of Log4j is tasked with logging a class at level TRACE, no trace messages are logged - only levels above trace (debug, info, etc.).  Turning on verbose logging for log4j reveals no errors or warnings.

As a workaround, building with update 37 allows TRACE level logging to be performed.  I haven't attempted to determine which JDK 6 update broke trace level logging, but it's definitely somewhere between 37 and 45.

creator: mike.hovis@sailpoint.com
text: Something else had caused an issue with aspect weaving.
